website_summaries.verdict: A stylish comforter set that includes everything you need to make over your bed.
pros: Beautiful raina patterned comforter, available in several colors
Set includes comforter, pillow sham, and two decorative throw pillows
Sits at an affordable price point
cons: Gold detailing may ware off over time

customer_reviews.title: When i first received it I was in love with it
customer_reviews.text: When i first received it I was in love with it. The gold was beautiful against the blush. After a wash, you can no longer see any of the gold metallic. It has completely faded. Also, both decorative pillows came with holes at the bottom so all the stuffing is coming out. I am so disappointed because it really is beautiful in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie O

customer_reviews.title: Very sassy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the BEST COMFORTERS I EVER BRAUGHT. came with pillows and looks amazing in my room. I washed it yesterday and dried it and its STILL LIKE BRAND NEW. THIS IS AN HONEST REVIEW . Ive ordered so many flukey comforters for this price and never lived up to my expectations. BEST BUY EVER!! Note : my lights are bit yellowish,so not as pink as in person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally  found matching  Curtains for this bed set
customer_reviews.text: It was a struggle to find curtains to match this bedset but I found a perfect match on another website.i thought I'd share the news case anybody else was looking for curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Contreraz

customer_reviews.title: The gold details has worn off after having the set ...
customer_reviews.text: The gold details has worn off after having the set for two weeks, very disappointing. Also I am constantly waking up covered in small glitter particles because that’s how the gold wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty until it's first wash.
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks nice straight out of the package but if you try to wash it or get it wet all of the foil comes off. After that it's completely destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: See Picture.  Feel comfortable .. True to picture
customer_reviews.text: As described. same as picture. no complaints. just need a steamer to get some of wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter for teens room
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful comforter, love the colors. We bought the grey one. It’s a tad thin hence the one star off. Time will tell if the glitter comes off. I will absolutely update after first wash or if it randomly comes off. Throw pillows are good quality and cute. Full/Queen size fit our full bed perfectly. Doesn’t come w sheets which I knew beforehand but Amazon makes some good ones for 20.00 so I bought those in light grey.
customer_reviews.author: United1981

customer_reviews.title: Can be a little overpowering so add another color
customer_reviews.text: I love this it looks super cute in my room and the fluffy pillows don’t come with but it looks so good. If you have a lot of pink stuff in you room I would recommend to put in some gray to make it a little less overwhelming. I love this shipping tool the time it said and it’s definitely worth $80
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using it for a week now and it is so pretty. Not thick but also not thin. The gold has not rubbed off as everyone has said. This is very well made and looks great in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Jimie C

customer_reviews.title: Very Ugly and Horrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with this product. Can not express how much. Literally. The description is misleading and false advertising. It is not what it looks like on the picture neither from the Product Details page either. Very expensive for the extremely low quality. Not to mention is even more expensive on Wayfair ($84). This product is not worth $50. Maybe $25. If you wash it the metallic will go away as of what I read in the review. I received it and returned it without even putting it on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeylis Oliva

customer_reviews.title: FOR DECO PURPOSES ONLY - YOU CANNOT WASH IN MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: FOR DECO PURPOSES ONLY - YOU CANNOT WASH IN MACHINE IT IS SHORT AND NOT BIG ENOUGH FOR A KING SIZE BED THE PHOTO IS not showing you how it really looks for a king size bed. Secondly it says 'SPOT CLEAN ONLY' Tell me what the heck am i doing with a spot clean only bedspread. so everynight i use my IKEA bedspread. roll this one up bc it is for cuteness only. It has NO WEIGHT TO IT... CHEAP WEIGHT QUALITY. but looks beautiful on the bed. Like I said this is for 'luxurious' look but not to use for resting. Don't fart on it bc you will be in trouble. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 months ago and the silver is already coming off. The material is scratchy and thin. I wouldn’t buy this again and wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schol

customer_reviews.title: Reviewed after many washings
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews about the shiny lines coming off in the wash. I have had this for a few months now and wash this bedding typically one time per week. I wash it in cold. I dry it on low. It is still as shiny as the day I purchased it. It is still holding up perfectly after all those washings as well.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE everything about this set! Bought it for my 10 year olds room makeover. We live that it’s girly but not babyish. The gold is really pretty. It’s reasonably soft for the price point. Very true to color. This set was the foundation for what became a beautiful blush and gold little girls bedroom and bathroom suite!We added cute throw pillows (found here) and the gold polka dot wall decals (comes recommended with this item here on amazon) and it’s just perfect. Will definitely work long term since it’s not colors or designs that will go out of style as she gets more mature.
customer_reviews.author: M Deep23

customer_reviews.title: Pretty glamorous style, light and comfort as expected
customer_reviews.text: This set is soft and light as expected. I live in Florida and the light weight and warmness is just enough to give you this feeling of having a comforter on you.. The color is very pretty sober style with a glimpse of glamorous shiny style from the gold lines, it goes very well with my beige frame and white walls. I ordered another one in pink both very pretty (pink can be see as a bit girly » it would go very well for a little girls) be only extra careful if you use one of those washers with central turbine as the material is delicate
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Prettier in person
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my niece, It was prettier in person than pictured. It was soft, but didn’t seem as fluffy after one week. The extra throw pillow is embroidered with the word love and the threads were not clipped. The comforter color is a pretty aqua the silver is a lot of iron on dots. No sheets included with this set , a little pricey for the quality, It arrived quickly. She loves it,I’m happy. I would probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Preston

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful beautiful beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I’m starting with a 5 star review, may come back later and update. I LOVE this comforter set!!! It’s beautiful to the eye! I paired it with satin silver sheets and it absolutely stunning! You may thing “little girl” when you see the set, but I am 21 and this design makes me so happy to look at! Based on the feel I’d say wash in cold water on low tumble dry to preserver the actual cotton on the j side of the comforter, but here’s hoping it works! Please buy this if your trying to up your game. My guests love it and it’s just drop dead gorgeous to look at!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: This is a RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in April got it on time. BUT I JUST PUT IT ON MY BED AN STARTED USING 2WKS AGO and ALREADY the GOLD is STARTING TO FADE OFF of my pillows and my blanket! So if fat it would probly just be an ivory set a if I were to dare to wash it! I'm very upset!!! Charge me a $119 this is what happens! NOT OK!!! Wouldn't purchase this if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy lee

customer_reviews.title: FADED IMMEDIATELY. Don't buy unless you only want to look at it.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this, at first I was 110% pleased! It was soft, really cute, and looked really nice and bright without being over the top. I loved it and wanted to give it 5/5 stars! However, after using this bed set, and one wash later, I might as well as of bought plain pink sheets. The glitter on the sheets came off immediately. I woke up every morning covered in gold sparkles. The pattern has completely faded to the point that the sheets just look pale pink. Do not buy this unless you intend to just look at it and not use it. Otherwise, enjoy being covered in gold sparkles and enjoy your new, faded, pale pink sheets! 0/5
customer_reviews.author: kenya

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. I'm not sure why it says microfiber, because the blanket is just normal blanket fabric. VERY THIN. It's more like a blanket than a comforter. Doesn't include sheets which makes it not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Noe

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Exceeded My Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Exceeded My Expectations! I love everything about this set! From the color (I chose silver with absolutely beautiful metallic silver design) to the utter softness of the fabric, to the perfect weight of the comforter (neither to hot nor too cold). Just perfect with my silver and mirror dresser with crystal knobs. They play off each other perfectly and knock each other up quite a few notches together. Great buy, would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jess8888

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This comforter set is gorgeous! I ordered the queen size. Its super soft and comfortable. Not to mention that when the natural light hits it.. it brightens up the room and looks so clean and classy. It came with (1) comforter, (2) decorative pillow shams, and (2) small decorative pillows. The only defect I've noticed is that on one of the small decorative pillows there's a tiny spot on the corner of the pillow. Hopefully I'll be able to remove it easily. But other than that, I absolutely love it. Its pretty, soft, light weight, and looks just like the product picture shown. I definitely recommend this comforter set for sure! ***If helpful, please click 'Helpful'*** :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The comforter looks really nice and elegant in the pictures however in person it’s an extremely cheap quality. The decorative pillows were ripped at the seams with thread everywhere and once I felt the quality of the comforter I didn’t even bother to take it out the bag. This is really one of those ”bed in a bag” that’s worth $25. Also you can tell that the silver foil will come off with limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not stitched correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Comforter not stitch properly, threads hanging off material and some areas not stitched at all. It’s a beautiful comforter other than those faults. Would want to return it for another one. But too sick to carry it to send back. I ordered another one because I really love it. I’ll just have to take the first one to be stitched properly by my seamstress. How disappointing. They never reply to my review.
customer_reviews.author: Heavenly

customer_reviews.title: So lovely!! Passes the Texas summer in August test!
customer_reviews.text: This gold foil set is so beautiful! Definitely brightens up the room and makes it feel so modern! And it's not too heavy or hot for Texas August summer!! I was really happy about that. DEFINITELY DRY CLEAN ONLY.....for obvious reasons of the gold foil. Plus comforter stuffing is notorious for clumping after getting wet anyways. Just dry clean it and save yourself the hassle. You can probably wash the shams, inside out, on cold and delicate, and air fluff (no heat!!) to dry. Use common sense people!!
customer_reviews.author: AntiSocial Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Trendy for sure, but not that thick!
customer_reviews.text: This is great bedding and the design is suitable for a single person or a couple. Easy to accent with other decorative pieces. The comforter is lightweight, and not fit for winter in my opinion. You’d need a much heavier throw or additional blanket. Some have asked about the gold design—it’s a gorgeous foul and has no additional weird texture. Fits a CAL KING better than most alleged Cal King comforters. The shams are the reason I’d order this set twice😝
customer_reviews.author: Kelz of course

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Redid my daughters room for her 10th birthday. We loved this comforter set and used it as the inspiration for her room redo. It all turned out very cute. We have had it about 3 months now and no issues with quality or the gold rubbing off. I do have her fold it and use a different blanket to cover up with so it will stay nice longer. Overall pleased with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but it’s not fluffy
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it’s not fluffy as it’s show in the pictures and the quality it’s not the best for the price. Looks good but it’s not what I am looking for at that price. Sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: Pascalita

customer_reviews.title: Modern and cute
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I have gold accents in my room, so I wanted a bed with gold on it. Most of the gold comforters looked.... grandma-ish? I don’t know how to nicely say that. This one is great. It’s modern. It has hints of gold without being gaudy. It’s super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Shyanne Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste you $$$
customer_reviews.text: Product was nothing like discribed! Extremely cheesy and cheap looked defective and to return.
customer_reviews.author: ryan laninfa

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the high recommendations and how cute it looked online, but honestly, it looks a lot cheaper in person. VERY CHEAP MATERIAL, and is suitable for maybe a kids comforter. It's not heavy at all, so when it's cold I always have to put another blanket on top of it, and even then it's still not enough. For $80, you're better off going to Macy's and getting a good quality one on sale, for a cheaper price. If it wasn't a few days after the return date, I would've returned the product already after actually testing it out with weather conditions.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking about this bed set, buy it! It looks great and feels AMAZING. Nice and fluffy. Paired it with some black Amazon basic sheets. Great combo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everybody is Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Finalul the Girls want to sleep by themselves :). It’s a win win. Comfy and warm. Love the colours
customer_reviews.author: Andreea F.

customer_reviews.title: A bit thin but pretty
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is pretty thin it's more like a light weight duvet so I'm hoping it's warm enough when it gets really cold here. It's very soft and the set is very pretty, though a little on the pricey side considering the comforter is not very plush.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Wild

customer_reviews.title: Worried about  this product plz read this!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what we were looking for! It was bigger than expected. Matches description to a T. We love it so much. If your on the fence about this product hope off the fence! Because I will recommend it in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Russomanno

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but faded fast
customer_reviews.text: This is a very soft cozy and pretty comforter set. My only issue was when I washed the pillow sham the gold stripes faded so its mostly just a pink pillow sham now
customer_reviews.author: Martha Clove

customer_reviews.title: Design comes off
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, cause my daughter was really excited about the design. I should have heeded the other reviewers. First this came ripped. I didn’t realize it because it sat in the bag for almost 4 weeks before I opened it. By the time I realized and got my life together enough to return it (thanks Covid), I passed my return date. So I decided to cut my losses, sew it myself and make my daughter happy. Two washes, my friends. That’s all it took to almost completely remove the gold pattern on both the comforter and the pillowcases. It was a complete waste of money. Don’t buy this set
customer_reviews.author: Matt Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Glamorous but...
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of this comforter but it barely covers the edges on my king mattress. It also wrinkles very easily. It’s a guest bedroom so it’s not a big deal plus it looks beautiful!! Oh if you decide to iron it like I did.. just be aware it creates A LOT of static. I don’t know if it was just me but I was traumatized. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Wash before using-factory fabric chemicals..cold water, remove immediately from medium dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Grandaughter's 8th Birthday. So sparkly and pillows that go with it are really nice. Very smelly though so must be washed. Carefully. Cold water etc. and take right out of dryer at end. Such a nice changed from all of the graphic ones.
customer_reviews.author: alexree

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter, it’s visually appealing, and super soft and fluffy. I actually only have slept on top of it, because I get too hot at night, so if you turn into a human oven like me you will love how the gold accents call of your body. I’ve washed about 6 times and it’s still fully intact.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Odell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bedding set
customer_reviews.text: We redid our 11 year old daughters room and she initially wanted a marble set, but this happened to be on sale. I'm glad I purchased this when I did because I bought it for $55, now I see the price has increased to $90+. This is a great bedding set - very pretty and super soft. I would not hesitate to purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen890

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Love the overhang on a full size bed. Quality seems decent but haven’t washed it yet. Will update review if there’s a problem after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Piddle

customer_reviews.title: No problems washing or drying.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this comforter! Soo elegant and pretty. It's lightweight add a flat sheet if you're looking for more warmth. First picture is straight out of the box. The second picture is after a wash/dry on delicate for both. No problems with the gold coming off or lightening up. Super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandielicous

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, not so durable
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of this comforter for my daughters room (I ordered a twin). But I was disappointed that even after washing on delicate, and drying extra low, that a corner of the comforter has almost melted. It now has a weird texture on that corner but no other part has been effected. Overall cute. Just wish it was more durable, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: AJKJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is very cheaply made. It looks beautiful on the picture but it is very different when you receive it. It came so cramped in the packaging and so full of creases which I don't know how to remove. It is embarrassing to have it on my bed full of wrinkles. It was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many blankets ranging from cheap to expensive but I do have to say this one keeps me the warmest. It traps heat amazingly which I know I will love in the next few months lol great purchase. I got the Twin size and I’m 5’8 and it’s longer than me. Perfection c:
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Burden

customer_reviews.title: Fading after 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Color was true to picture. Sadly only after 5 months is already fading. Having constantly small glitter on from the pillow cases and comforter. Specially the pillow cases, they have completely faded (as they get use more) and now it just doesn’t look nice. It probably was made for a show room/display; not for daily use. Quite a bummer as it looks so nice and is a beautiful color. Is ok, I wouldn’t recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Celi

customer_reviews.title: Gold fades
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year in December and I really loved the comforter when I first got it. Just be warned the gold does fade off even if you wash it on cold. I am now on the hunt for a new comforter set that does not lose its color over time.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Clarke

customer_reviews.title: She had to have this!
customer_reviews.text: The daughter had to have this for her dorm room once she saw it on another website. I couldn't get it shipped in time by the other place, so I found it on Amazon. We got it in two days and it was perfect. It's lightweight, the silver dots that make up the design blend right into the fabric so there is nothing that might come off. (Time will tell.) The extra two small pillows that came with it are cute. Looked really nice once the bed was made up.
customer_reviews.author: JGG

customer_reviews.title: Good stitch!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it’s reversible and it blend in perfect with my bedroom set .. nothing really to dislike about this product honestly.. I machine wash it in cold water and hang to dry simple because I don’t want the heat to burn out the sliver lining or shrink the material ...
customer_reviews.author: Humble

customer_reviews.title: The comforter came apart when washed and dried according to directions.
customer_reviews.text: The comforter was beautiful but it did not hold up when washed and dried. The comforter shredded around the edges and shrank even though directions were followed. My granddaughter was very disappointed and upset.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Broughton

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty comforter, it’s not the best quality, nor the worst, I got what I paid for, runs a little small though, dosnt fit my queen as I would have expected it to, overall I’m satisfied, not excited, but it will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m totally surprised this product is an Amazons choice. Just received and don’t think I’m gonna keep. It’s definitely not the description. It very poor quality but it was also cheap in price. I usually look at ratings but this product shouldn’t be an amazons choice. Extremely poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and comfy. But definitely not worth the price. Will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute but Has No Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking bedspread and very cute. It's a light color so picks up dirt easily which is expected with such a light color. After the first wash and dry the design faded considerably. Second wash, large sections were completely washed out. Third wash, it's pretty much a vanilla-colored comforter, no design left. Aesthetically, this was very pleasing until you wash it. It's a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E. Schuerman

customer_reviews.title: Great design, bad smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and style but I was so bummed about the smell. I just got this yesterday and it smells simply terribly - almost fishy. Some of the gold started flaking after I took it out of the dryer last night. My daughter still thinks it’s awesome but hopefully improvements can be made!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: It is like a light, warm, fluffy cloud!
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is so soft and light it is as though you are holding a cloud. It is very warm. It was a present for my 83 year old Mother and she is thrilled with it. It is a bit long for her hospital bed but no big deal. We Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: At first I was going to give this 4 stars I washed it and it feels hard now and part of it turned a different color
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bed set!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set is gorgeous. I've washed it many times and it still has that beautiful gold sheen to it. Not too heavy, not too light. My daughters stay warm with just this covering them during cool nights.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Fits bedroom color theme perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have had this comforter for a month now and it is perfect! I wanted to create a Slytherin (from Harry Potter) inspired room. I see a lot of people saying that it was ruined after washing- I have washed it twice (I have pets) and both times I pretreated any spots and washed it on delicate settings and hung it up to dry. It still looks and feels perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash...
customer_reviews.text: Worst comforter I ever owned. Had it for 2 months and wash it twice and now its in the garbage. Before even the first wash all the gold area were starting to wear off. By the end of the two months, the majority of the gold wore away. Would never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Covered in glitter.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this comforter and received it May 7th. I love the design and it is really comfortable. I washed it one time when I got it. I tend to lay on top of my comforter and all of a sudden I noticed I was covered in glitter, at first I was confused where it was coming from. I noticed like other people the shiny parts were getting really dull. I have woke up everyday covered in glitter it is not noticeable but u ser certain light it becomes obvious. I have to look for a new comforter one that is not shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Max Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled after wash
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, got kind of wrinkled when i washed for the first time but still nice!
customer_reviews.author: Nakita Ard

customer_reviews.title: What a great comforter!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter!! It is so pretty - silky grey with shiny silver. Beautiful pattern. So soft and luxurious. My bedroom looks great now, and I'm even sleeping better!! It's lightweight but heavy enough for comfort, and I don't feel suffocated. Definitely recommend this comforter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Tingen

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: The color is great but the quality is garbage! The inside feels rough and not soft at all!! I replaced the first one thinking it was a oopsie. Nah. The end one is just as bad and also has this stain on the bottom corner 🙄 like a burn color. Returning again and just going to shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Janel Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, soft, color as pictured, good fit as expected. My daughter redid her bedroom this summer and chose this herself. It was exactly as she wanted!! Would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RIP THE TAGS OFF
customer_reviews.text: Don't rip the tags off, it leaves a hope in the comforter and pillows that I now need to sew back. Aside from that, I love this set! Very cute, lightweight, comfortable, and worth the money. 4 stars because of the tags.
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Zani Nixon

customer_reviews.title: BEDSET WILL NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: This has been said before in the reviews, but the gold does fade over time. I’ve been careful with the washing, only washing on delicate with cool water and drying on low. However, it seems that just coming into contact with the gold wears it off. The pillow sham I slept on was the first to fade (after about 1 month) and the place where my dog often sleeps on top of the comforter has worn off after about 3 months. I’m very disappointed, as I now need to buy another bed set and they aren’t cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, I added the purple velvet throw pillows, and just used the small throw pillow it cane with. I use rude white throw pillow on my chair, the pink on it matches my pink chair perfectly, so that worked out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: edna

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: It's gorgeous! The pictures just don't do it justice! It's not flimsy feeling like a lot of comforters. I wasn't sure about ordering it without seeing/being able to touch it first, but I'm so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Franki

customer_reviews.title: Grey Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Comfortable. Just wish was bigger. I have a king size bed. Over all for the price Im satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina love

customer_reviews.title: BEST AFFORDABLE COMFORTER ON AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad that I purchased this comfortable set! Not only is it affordable but for the price it’s so chic and glamorous! It was perfect for my room decor!
customer_reviews.author: Kavina G.

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, cozy, cozy!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is not only beautiful looking, it is COMFORTABLE! I cannot seem to get out of bed lately because our house temperature is maintained at 65 degrees and this cozy comforter is hard to let go in the morning! Absolutely loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter set
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent comforter set for a teen girl. My daughter chose the blush gold. She loves it! I wish the color was a little more vibrant but it is still a decent choice.
customer_reviews.author: A1Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Such A Lovely, Spirit-Lifting Creation
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set exceeded my expectations. It even makes my bedroom appear larger. I pair it with light gray sheets and pillowcases. It also works well with blue or burgundy colors. I love the way light bounces off it. Such a lovely creation!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bush

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Totally didn't realize it came with 2 little pillows (they're cute) but I have so many pillows on my bed, now 😂 but I love it. Some of the reviews said it was "too thin", but its just like a bed-in-a-bag you buy at the store. Doesn't come with sheets, which was fine for me, because I wanted pink sheets anyways. I bought a cali king size because I am buying that size bed for thos to go on. Right now, it's on a full size bed. I bought it "used" for the cheaper price, and there is nothing wrong with it
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Harper

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty design. I washed my comforter twice in cold water and dried it on low heat. No problem with the pattern coming off and the filling stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Solomon

customer_reviews.title: College student- great price
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this bedding last year for my college dorm room using it again this year it’s all held up very well and I definitely recommend if you’re a college student looking to get nice bedding for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bedder!! It is so pretty and fits my room perfectly. The only downfall is that it collects dust and lint easily but the quality of the bed set surpasses that! It is still worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Intelligent Design Raina Comforter Set
customer_reviews.text: I liked the Ivory/gold design, very soft. I didn't like the fact that cal-king did not completely cover the entire bed, that was disappointing, whenever I make up the bed, I have to pull most of the spread to the side that shows. The comforter is extremely hot, at night I wake up sweating, so I took it off the bed for now. It's really for show. Overall I do like the way it makes my bed looks expensive. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is so soft and it keeps me warm every night. Although it is kinda barely thin so you may want an extra blanket. I love it so much soooo worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRANSITION FROM CHILD TO TWEEN GIRL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 yo granddaughter. It is very pretty on her bed. As she transitions from a child to a young lady. Stylish and well made. Great quality materials!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Smith Koff

customer_reviews.title: Too Expensive to be so poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Durable? Hell no! My daughter sobbed as the stitching started coming undone within one day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bruce Banner

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set
customer_reviews.text: Got this bedding for my 8 year old and she loves it. It does not come with sheets which is disappointing. It is super soft, well made and so so pretty. Over all it really looks great
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful comforter I have ever owned. This is a must buy. I am so glad I found this item. It is so nice and warm also.
customer_reviews.author: happy bride

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and it matches my bedroom decor and color scheme perfectly. It's not cheaply made like some other comforter sets that I e bought. The embroidery on the.pills is gorgeous! Nothing bad to say at all!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Cheapy-cheap
customer_reviews.text: 75% of the gold sparkle washes off after the FIRST wash (it was washed completely as the directions say). Picture shows pillowcase pre-washing, and comforter after 1 wash on delicate cycle and air dried.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Loved it awesome beautiful perfect just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely horrible
customer_reviews.text: The box is completely broken and taped back together! The pillows were completely falling apart at the seems and they have threads sticking all out. Material is coming out of them completely. Came in horrible condition.the gold on the comforter was tacky and sticky almost like a rubber type of material nothing like the description. I was very disappointed and returned it before i even put it on my bed. If i could give this product less then a star i would.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bedding set! I did not have any issue with the gold coming off and I have washed it weekly for 2+ months. Would highly recommend for the value! Only wish it came with a bedskirt
customer_reviews.author: Christie Wise

customer_reviews.title: Cute Bedding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old daughter who actually was the one to pick out herserf as we are changing up her room to appear not so much princess like.., it came well packaged, soft, I wish the comforter was a bit thicker, but still very cute on and beautiful pink color, we added the white and gold small pillows just to give it more of a pop. Overall awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy waste of money ❗️
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a great comforter set at first really cute but Do not buy the cover was good at first but the glitter comes off the cover and pillowcases WASTE OF MONEY & only had it 1 month
customer_reviews.author: shawnqualla west

customer_reviews.title: Super cute...perfect for a teenager!
customer_reviews.text: Totally cute for a teenager’s room! The comforter is soft and light. It fits a full size bed perfectly with some hang on both sides. I can see this being short on a queen. My daughter loves it. Lightweight and perfect for warmer months. I will layer it with a down comforter for the winter. Great value and 2 day shipping!
customer_reviews.author: FAheartsLv

customer_reviews.title: Faded in a month
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a month and it’s Already completely faded. I’m super disappointed and can’t find a way to refund. It’s really pretty and exactly what I wanted but, the quality is not there.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Weaks

customer_reviews.title: Must have item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13-year-old daughter for Christmas, she loves it! Easy to clean fits in the washer and dryer, is extraordinarily beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Mantia

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLISTIC DAZZLE
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is striking, lovely to the touch of skin. Love the design! Looks great in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bazemore

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft and I love the quality. Have received many compliments. Use this for the guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty at First!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. It is really pretty, until it's about 2 months old. The gold stripes fade extremely quick and easy. Here it is just 7 months later and the gold stripes are completely gone. So unless you want to end up with a blush pink comforter in 7 months I would not recommend purchasing this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful comforter set that is super soft and comfy. Not sure who packaged it at the factory but they definitely packed a dirty pillow. For that reason I gave the set a four out of five but of course, Amazon will replace it. Got a love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful comforter and when I first got it I was in love however the gold faded really quickly I think the gold looked good for about 2 months the got really dull. When you cover yourself with the comforter it’s not really comfortable it feels like your covered in plastic
customer_reviews.author: Krystal moreno

product_meta.title: Intelligent Design Raina Comforter Set Metallic Print Geometric Design, Modern Trendy All Season Bedding Set, Matching Sham, Decorative Pillow, Blush/Gold, Twin/Twin XL, 4 Piece
product_meta.description: Size:Twin/Twin XL| Color:Blush/Gold| Design:SetFreshen up your bedroom with the enchanting style of Intelligent Design’s Raina Comforter Set. The stunning comforter flaunts a geometric, metallic gold print against a soft blush ground for a fun and eye-catching look! Matching sham(s) echo the design seen on top of the bed to pull the entire ensemble together. Two embroidered decorative pillows with typography and metallic details complete this fabulous, ultra-soft microfiber comforter set.
feature_bullets: Product Features - Ultra soft brushed microfiber with metallic geometric gold printing. The reverse comes with brushed microfiber to keep you comfortable, cozy and snugly at night

Fabrication - polyester brushed microfiber accented with geometric gold printing. Decorative pillows come with intricate embroidery and metallic printing to complete the collection. Modern style with stunningly eye catching glamorous design to match your diva personality
Easy care - machine wash cold, gentle cycle, and separately. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low, remove promptly, do not iron
Satisfaction guaranteed - we offer 100% satisfaction guarantee with 30-day free return
Package includes - (1) comforter 68” x 90”, (1) sham 20” x 26”, (2) decorative pillows 12” x 16” and 16” x 16”

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,506 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
